examples.description: includes a <style> tag within the <head> of index.html
examples.full_description: Styling an <h1> with a <style> tag and Element Selector includes a <style> tag within the <head> of index.html

examples.description: includes a rule for h1 using the h1 element selector
examples.full_description: Styling an <h1> with a <style> tag and Element Selector styling the <h1> includes a rule for h1 using the h1 element selector
Styling an <h1> with a <style> tag and Element Selector styling the <h1> makes the font-size of <h1> 60px
Styling an <h1> with a <style> tag and Element Selector styling the <h1> makes the font-weight of <h1> 300

examples.description: makes the font-family of <h1> Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif
examples.full_description: Styling an <h1> with a <style> tag and Element Selector styling the <h1> makes the font-family of <h1> Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif

examples.description: includes a rule for h3 using the h3 element selector
examples.full_description: Styling an <h1> with a <style> tag and Element Selector styling the <h3> includes a rule for h3 using the h3 element selector
Styling an <h1> with a <style> tag and Element Selector styling the <h3> makes the font-size of <h3> 28px
Styling an <h1> with a <style> tag and Element Selector styling the <h3> has a color of #868e96
Styling an <h1> with a <style> tag and Element Selector styling the <h3> has a text-decoration of underline
Styling an <h1> with a <style> tag and Element Selector styling the <h3> has a font-family of Verdana
